title: (x) special font "Trans" - Inverserif (Concorde) {Dav, Mike Y}
content:
Hello!

I am searching for this special font. Can someone help me out ?

Greets,  
Kay

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [h.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112201254/http:/typophile.com/files/h.jpg) | 17.67 KB |
author: snaft

comments.content:
I have seen this called Inverserif, from Font Company. I believe it is the correct name. [Font Factory](http://web.archive.org/web/20141112201254/http:/www.fontfactory.com/index.php/manufacturers_id/38) apparently still sells these fonts, now that Precision Type has gone out of business.

- Mike Yanega

Yea, I was pretty sure that there was another name, as well, and I just found another sample in one of my books also naming it 'Inverserif'.. _Thanks, Mike.._

Dav
